elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: What does stylistics deal with?
elements.correctAnswer: with the design of the linguistic expression

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Which levels are differentiated?
elements.correctAnswer: Word level, sentence level, text level

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What are communication texts?
elements.correctAnswer: Texts that you use to get in touch with others

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What are the 4K qualities of good communication texts?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What do you convey with clear, correct and cultivated language?
elements.correctAnswer: Language skills, diligence, commitment and appreciation

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What added value do good communication texts have in business?
elements.correctAnswer: They demonstrate quality awareness and strengthen trust.
